title: Different Sizes
content: Tampax is my trusted brand for when I'm on my period. I have tried other brands and they don't see to fit my needs. I love that this Tampax Pearl Trio Pack has a variety of sizes. I'm one who needs different sizes in a week, starting small and then needing larger for heavier days mid-week. The pearl applicator helps comfort for inserting and gliding. It's smooth and easy.
